name: Open Source projects by Michael MÃ¼ller
body:
|Name|Description|Screenshot|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|[Billy](https://github.com/haimich/billy)|A simple invoice manager built with Electron.|![billy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/billy/master/concept/billy_sm.png)|
|[Event](https://github.com/haimich/event)|A platform to manage events and conferences built on NodeJS.|![event](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/event/master/documentation/event_small.png)|
|[Flatfinder](https://github.com/haimich/flatfinder)|A web scraper tool that regularly scans websites where flats are offered to buy.|![flatfinder](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/flatfinder/master/logo_small.png)|
|[Knick-Knack](https://github.com/knick-knack/knick-knack)|A language agnostic project scaffolding tool.|![knick-knack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/knick-knack/knick-knack/master/doc/knickknack_small.png)|
|[Photobooth](https://github.com/haimich/photobooth)|A JavaScript photobooth application where you can pick an own background image via green screen.|![photobooth](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/photobooth/master/concept/photobooth_small.png)|
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
